title: QUESTION SUBMISSIONS ARE NOW CLOSED! For a spooky October 2020 Q & A (+ UPDATE)
description:
QUESTION SUBMISSIONS ARE NOW CLOSED. It's time for a scary October Q & A video.  Plus the channel just hit 600 subscribers. Get your questions in now. I'll close the call for questions VERY SOON. 2 or 3 days at most. 

And remember you can contribute to The Anadromist through PayPal here.
https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RG
